query:
UPDATE decks
         SET
            title = COALESCE($1, title),
            description = COALESCE($2, description),
            visibility = COALESCE($3, visibility),
            assignee = CASE
            WHEN $7 = true THEN NULL
            ELSE
            COALESCE($4, assignee)
            END
         WHERE id = $5 AND created_by = $6
